com.toxic.core.engine.base

Interface IElement

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IScene

    public interface IElement

    This main object into the API. It provide generic element with wide capabilities and functionality.


    Author:
    Strelock

      • addChild

        void addChild(IElement child)

        Add child to current element. Child will be positioned relative to current element.

        NOTE : if current element isClipped() rendering out of it size elements will be skipped.


        Parameters:
        child -

               float y)

        Settled position of current element


        Parameters:
        x - location relative X axis
        y - location relative Y axis

      • setOrigin

        void setOrigin(float x,
             float y)

        Set origin of current element. Relative point of origin current element will be rotated and all child elements positioned.


        Parameters:
        x - location of X axis
        y - location of Y axis

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(float angle)

        Set rotating angle of element in radiant.


        Parameters:
        angle - radiant of rotating angle

        Parameters:

      • setAplha

        void setAplha(float alpha)

        Setting up opacity value of element.

        NOTE : opacity coudn't be less or equals zero or greater then one.


        Parameters:
        alpha -

        Parameters:
        x - width of element
        y - height of element

      • setDepth

        void setDepth(float depth)

        Setting up depth of element. Depth determines ordering of element. If depth of element greater then it sibling, it will be rendered early.


        Parameters:
        depth -

      • animateShake

        CancelHandler animateShake(float amplitudeX,
                         float amplitudeY,
                         tripleplay.util.Interpolator mode,
                         float duration)

        Animate element randomly shifted it.


        Parameters:
        amplitudeX - maximum amplitude of shift relative X axis
        amplitudeY - maximum amplitude of shift relative Y axis
        mode - animation behavior
        duration - time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        CancelHandler instance that ,has possibility cancel animation.

      • animateTransition

        CancelHandler animateTransition(float x,
                              float y,
                              tripleplay.util.Interpolator mode,
                              float duration)

        Simple animation transition to supplied point.


        Parameters:
        x - location relative to axis X
        y - location relative to axis Y
        mode - the animation behavior mode
        duration - time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        CancelHandler instance that ,has possibility cancel animation.

      • animateAction

        CancelHandler animateAction(CustomAnimation action,
                          tripleplay.util.Interpolator mode,
                          int duration)

        Provide creation of complicated animation through the CustomAnimation instance.


        Parameters:
        action - CustomAnimation object , that will be periodically executed through the CustomAnimation.uppdate(float) method.
        mode - the animation behavior mode
        duration - time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        CancelHandler instance that ,has possibility cancel animation.

      • animateRotate

        CancelHandler animateRotate(float angle,
                          tripleplay.util.Interpolator mode,
                          int duration)

        Animate rotation of element to supplied value of angle in radiant.


        Parameters:
        angle - value of angle in radiant
        mode - the animation behavior mode
        duration - time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        CancelHandler instance that ,has possibility cancel animation.

      • animateOpacity

        CancelHandler animateOpacity(float to,
                           tripleplay.util.Interpolator mode,
                           int duration)

        Change alpha parameter from current to supplied subsequently time in milliseconds.


        Parameters:
        to - value of alpha parameter in the end of animation.
        mode - the animation behavior mode
        duration - time in milliseconds
        Returns:
        CancelHandler instance that ,has possibility cancel animation.
